net.semanticmetadata.lire

Interface SearchHitsFilter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LsaFilter, RerankFilter

    public interface SearchHitsFilter
    Interface for all filters that take a result list and create a new result list. This can be done by actual filtering (removing parts) or by re-ranking, which would be a change in the ranking of the given results. Created 03.08.11, 10:28
    Author:
    Mathias Lux, mathias@juggle.at
    See Also:
    RerankFilter
